set_brightness.docs:
This [Action](https://esphome.io/automations/actions.html#config-action) allows you to manually change the brightness of the battery display at runtime.

*See also: [`tm1651.set_brightness` Action](https://esphome.io/components/tm1651.html#tm1651-set-brightness-action)*

brightness.docs:
**, [templatable](https://esphome.io/automations/templates.html#config-templatable), int**: There is three levels of brightness (`1`, `2` or `3`) from lowest to highest brightness.

*See also: [TM1651 Battery Display](https://esphome.io/components/tm1651.html#tm1651-set-brightness-action)*

set_level_percent.docs:

*See also: [`tm1651.set_level_percent` Action](https://esphome.io/components/tm1651.html#tm1651-set-level-percent-action)*

turn_off.docs:
This [Action](https://esphome.io/automations/actions.html#config-action) turns off all the LEDs.

*See also: [`tm1651.turn_off` Action](https://esphome.io/components/tm1651.html#tm1651-turn-off-action)*

turn_on.docs:
This [Action](https://esphome.io/automations/actions.html#config-action) turns on the LEDs.

*See also: [`tm1651.turn_on` Action](https://esphome.io/components/tm1651.html#tm1651-turn-on-action)*
